summary: Ray Cappo , also known as Raghunath Das , [ 2 ] is an American punk rock musician best known as the vocalist for the bands Youth of Today and Shelter and as founder of the independent record labels Revelation Records and Equal Vision Records . Originally from Connecticut , Cappo played drums for the band Violent Children.
